item.title: [PI] Adding Commands [PI]
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("James")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
Their is the proper command For Update. Change James To What ever u want.

Rep if u want

item.title: [PI] Adding Commands [PI]
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I want to add this command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("alex") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("chris") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ashton"))) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
